news-article.article-id: give us the article id, either your database or Feedzilla id
news-article.country-id: give ID, will probably be US
news-article.sentiment-rating: apparently the scale is -3,-2,-1,0,1,2,3 we'd have to convert to color scale, ie shades of red/blue
news-article.article-title: Feedzilla article title, ie Obama goes to Japan
news-article.related-countries-id: used for arrow pointers, null if there are none, country-id otherwise

news-article.article-summary: Snake Plissken is saving Brazil's first lady from New York
